title: [PS3] Ferrox CFW 4.60 CEX BD-NoBD Edition
description:
FERROX 4.60 CFW (NoBD Edition - Standard CEX) v1.00

A new noBD Custom Firmware (CFW) has been released for system firmware v4.60 by Italian developer Alexander with his FERROX 4.60 noBD Edition. This CFW is a Standard 4.60 CEX firmware based of his previous FERROX 4.60 released with this edition having the noBD patch for PS3 Consoles that have a broken Blu-ray drive and/or logic board that prevents games and apps from launching. With this this patched firmware those consoles can now launch those items. However if this Firmware is used on a console that has a working BluRay Drive then while this firmware is installed your drive will not work

CFW 4.60 FERROX 1:01 [BD EDITION] By Alexander! 

After much hard work and a lot of testing at the end of Alexander was able to fix the bug that did not allow games to start giving the original error 800XXX17. Now you can rest assured the original game works perfectly. Unfortunately still have not updated the Different Backup Manager, but we have heard that it is in the release version updated Gamesonic Manager. Below I leave you download.
